SELECT p.*, ( (CASE WHEN p.category_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT category_id FROM product WHERE id IN (SELECT product_id FROM interaction WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND type = 2)) THEN 0.6 ELSE 0 END) +
(CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM product p2 WHERE p2.id IN (SELECT product_id FROM interaction WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND type = 2) AND p.name LIKE CONCAT('%', p2.name, '%')) THEN 0.4 ELSE 0 END) ) AS relevance_score FROM product p WHERE p.id NOT IN (SELECT product_id FROM interaction WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND type = 2) ORDER BY relevance_score DESC, p.create_time DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT p.*, (COUNT(i_view.id) * 0.7 + COUNT(i_save.id) * 0.3) AS popularity_score FROM product p LEFT JOIN interaction i_view ON i_view.product_id = p.id AND i_view.type = 2 LEFT JOIN interaction i_save ON i_save.product_id = p.id AND i_save.type = 1 GROUP BY p.id ORDER BY popularity_score DESC, p.create_time DESC LIMIT #{limit}
